name: Mike Sullivan
funny_story: Once tried to play a round in flip-flops and somehow shot his best score ever.

name: Dave Chen
funny_story: Calculated the exact wind speed before every putt in 2022. Still three-putted on 18.

name: Rob Jenkins
funny_story: Wore his lucky Hawaiian shirt every round in 2021. The group voted to ban it.

name: Jason Park
funny_story: Hit a bird mid-flight off the tee on hole 7. The group still argues about whether it was a birdie.

name: Tony Ramirez
funny_story: Brought a Bluetooth speaker shaped like a golf ball. It rolled into a pond on day one.

name: Brad Kowalski
funny_story: Showed up to the 2023 trip with brand new clubs still in the plastic wrap.

name: Marcus Hall
funny_story: Accidentally drove the cart onto the wrong course. Played three holes before anyone noticed.

name: Kyle Thompson
funny_story: Lost 14 balls in one round and still says it was 'a solid day out there.'

name: Derek Foster
funny_story: Won the putting contest despite holding the putter backwards. Claims it's his technique.

name: Sam Rivera
funny_story: His slice is so consistent the group uses it to navigate. 'Just aim at Sam's ball and go left.'

name: Chris Wells
funny_story: Insisted on playing in cowboy boots. Shot 120 but looked great doing it.
